title: Calm Scandinavian Duplex Nestled in Ustka’s Port District
description: This serene, newly built duplex showcases minimalist Scandinavian design across 132 sqm. Large patio doors gently connect a sun-kissed lounge to private, landscaped gardens. Three bright bedrooms and three airy bathrooms establish balance between restful privacy and modern communal living. An open-plan kitchen influences natural interaction and understated aesthetics.
neighborhood_description: The Port District of Ustka features a tranquil, family-friendly vibe embraced by green ways and open spaces. Locals enjoy peaceful evenings and morning bike rides, well-connected via quick highway links and sweeping lanes. Everyday essentials and walkable park trails are moments away, framing a balanced lifestyle close to the Baltic coastline.
target_buyer: Ideal for long-term renters or families pursuing sustainable stability, tranquil surroundings, and space to grow.
market_positioning: A unique option for those seeking modern Scandinavian comfort, outdoor living, and slow-paced wellbeing, with a comparatively rare garden duplex in Ustka’s emerging coastal market.
